infotext.mlc.server.wrongversionclient: Your client is using the wrong version!\nClient: v[clientversion] Server: v[serverversion]
infotext.mlc.server.wrongversion: Client [client] is using the wrong version!
infotext.mlc.config.piratespawnchancetooltip: The base chance for a pirate outpost to spawn, this is then further modified by the regions difficulty. Default is 0.
infotext.mlc.config.piratehuskchancetooltip: The base chance for the pirate outpost to spawn with everyone on board husked. Default is 1.
infotext.mlc.config.piratedisplaysonartooltip: If a marker for the pirate base should appear on sonar
infotext.mlc.config.piratescaledifftooltip: If the difficulty of the pirates should scale with server members
infotext.mlc.config.debugverbosetooltip: Enable verbose logging, provides detailed (but longer) logs
infotext.mlc.config.debuginternaltooltip: Enable internal logging, which logs internal debugging messages to console
